Body:
signal = np.cos(np.linspace(start=0, stop=30, num=1000))
assert np.allclose(nk.entropy_fuzzy(signal), nk.entropy_sample(signal,
    fuzzy=True), atol=1e-06)
assert np.allclose(nk.fractal_dfa(signal, windows=np.array([4, 8, 12, 20])),
    2.1009048365682133, atol=1e-06)
assert np.allclose(nk.fractal_dfa(signal), 1.957966586191164, atol=1e-06)
assert np.allclose(nk.fractal_dfa(signal, multifractal=True), 
    1.957966586191164, atol=1e-06)
assert np.allclose(nk.fractal_correlation(signal), 0.7884473170763334, atol
    =1e-06)
assert np.allclose(nk.fractal_correlation(signal, r='nolds'), nolds.
    corr_dim(signal, 2), atol=0.0001)
